snippet: Finished basements have been a cost-effective way to increase living space, but builders in the Hamptons say restrictions have accelerated the trend....
abstract: Restrictive building codes and rising real estate prices are causing Hamptons home owners and developers to build en suite bedrooms, home theaters, spas, bowling alleys and other luxury amenities underground.
lead_paragraph: Finished basements have been a cost-effective way to increase living space, but builders in the Hamptons say restrictions have accelerated the trend.

headline.main: Underground and Over the Top in the Hamptons
